Pyorat.name: Radon Render 10.0 – E-Bike Fully
Pyorat.description: "What a noble design" - those were the first words of our colleagues when they saw the new RENDER 10.0. With a fresh design and optimized equipment we start the new season with full speed.

Pyorat.name: Cube Stereo Hybrid 140 HPC Actionteam 625 Nyon actionteam – E-Bike Fully
Pyorat.description: Mountain bike hybrid all-mountain performance has a new name. Four-piston calipers front and rear combine with the incredible grip of Schwalbe's Magic Mary SuperTrail 2.4in and Big Betty SuperGravity 2.4in tyres to provide poweful stopping in all conditions.
